questions.name: q_coding_assistant
questions.prompt:
Instructions:
You are an expert text classifier. Analyze the following ARTICLE_TEXT to determine if the primary subject is about the **impact of AI coding assistants on developer productivity.**

**Definition of Focus Topic:**
The article must discuss research, user experience, case studies, or opinions regarding how AI tools (such as GitHub Copilot, Amazon CodeWhisperer, or similar code suggestion/generation technologies) affect one or more of the following: **developer speed, efficiency, code quality, time-to-market, or the overall rate of code completion.**

**Classification Rules:**
1.  **TRUE** if the article's main focus is the positive or negative impact on developer productivity or efficiency due to using AI coding assistants.
2.  **FALSE** if the article only mentions coding assistants in passing, focuses purely on the technical features of the tool, or discusses general AI without relating it to development work efficiency.

**Output Format:**
Respond only with a single JSON object. Do not include any other text or explanation.

{
  "is_productivity_impact_article": [TRUE/FALSE]
}

ARTICLE_TEXT:
[Hier voeg je de tekst van het artikel in]
